Hello fellow Kerbalites,

Just wondering if its possible to shut down your batteries all together like in action groups. As my probe has 6 i find it quite annoying to shut each one down individually before it travels it's long journey's across the kerbol system.

Peace!
You could check it in the action group part of the VAB? I don't think it's possible, though.

Hey wasmic,

I just checked action groups and theres no actions for the batts. Shame Maybe the KSP team might add it in one day. It would be helpfull.

Thanks for your help dude.

Peace.
